Claw_Rake.help: The Umbra Beast quickly slashes at its prey causing a minor amount of lethal and negative energy as well as causing the target to bleed for a short amount of time causing a minor amount of lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Claw_Rake.shortHelp: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal/Negative), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Rake.targetHelp: You are bleeding from the Umbra Beast's Claw Rake!

Claw_Swipe.help: The Umbra Beast lashes out with its claws and causes a high amount of lethal and negative energy damage. Additionally, the target may suffer from bleeding and suffer additional lethal damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Claw_Swipe.shortHelp: Melee, Heavy DMG(Lethal/Negative), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Swipe.targetHelp: You are bleeding from the Umbra Beast's Claw Swipe!

Umbra_Swipe.help: The Umbra Beast lashes out with its claws and causes a high amount of lethal and negative energy damage. Additionally, the target may suffer from bleeding and suffer additional lethal damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Umbra_Swipe.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal/Negative), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Umbra_Swipe.targetHelp: You are bleeding from the Umbra Beast's Claw Swipe!

Shadowy_Binds.help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Fast Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Shadowy_Binds.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DOT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Shadowy_Binds.targetHelp: You have been entangled by Shadowy Binds and have been left immobilized.

Resistance.help: The Umbra Beast is highly resistant to Cold and Negative Energy, but is also slightly resistant to all forms of damage.

Terrifying_Roar.help: The Umbra Beast lets out a terrible roar that rattles the very soul of the targets within its cone. Affected targets will have their chance to hit reduced and may suffer from terrorize and Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Terrifying_Roar.shortHelp: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Negative Energy), Foe Terrorize, -To Hit
Terrifying_Roar.targetHelp: The Terrifying Roar has reduced your chance to hit and left you terrorized.
